title: G4MF Mesh Surface Binding Geometry Decomposition
description: Defines how binding values are associated with a specific geometry's decomposed elements.

accessor.description: The index of the accessor that contains indices into this binding's values. Each element corresponds to a decomposed element at the specified dimension.

dimension.description: The dimensional level to decompose to. 0 for vertices, 1 for edges, 2 for polygons, 3 for volumes, and so on. MUST NOT be greater than `index` + 2.

index.description: The index into the mesh surface's geometry array that this binding references.
